plugin.name: workarounds
plugin._long: Some hacks that might be required to make things work.

option.name: all_dialogs_modal
option._long: If false, the main window can be focused even if it has a dialog. The dialog is nevertheless kept on top of the main window. Kwin defaults to false.

option.name: dynamic_repaint_delay
option._long: If true, allows Wayfire to dynamically recalculate its max_render_time, i.e allow render time higher than max_render_time.

option.name: use_external_output_configuration
option._short: Use external output configuration instead of Wayfire's own.
option._long: If true, Wayfire will not handle any configuration options for outputs in the config file once an external daemon like https://github.com/emersion/kanshi sets the output configuration via the wlr-output-management protocol. Exceptions are made for options not available via wlr-output-management, like output mirroring and custom modelines.

option.name: remove_output_limits
option._short: Allow views to overlap between multiple outputs. Many of the core plugins will not behave properly with this option set!

option.name: force_preferred_decoration_mode
option._short: Force xdg-decoration clients to use the compositor-preferred decoration mode regardless of the client's preference.

option.name: enable_so_unloading
option._short: Enable calling dlclose() when a plugin is unloaded. Note that this may not work well with all plugins.

option.name: discard_command_output
option._short: Discard output from commands invoked by Wayfire, so that they don't end up in the logs.
